snippet.title: Mini Motorways - Launch Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Mini Motorways is available now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/mini-motorways-switch/

From the makers of Mini Metro, Mini Motorways is a game about drawing the roads that drive a growing city. Create a bustling metropolis, one road at a time, redesigning your city to keep the traffic flowing while carefully managing upgrades to meet the changing demands. How long can you keep the cities of the world moving?

#MiniMotorways #IndieWorld #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
